issue.title: [C++][Python] Read ACID Hive tables
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16621](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16621). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since Hive 3 produces ACID tables by default it will be great if Arrow can read them directly from HDFS.

See also: ARROW-14730
